title: New: Russians with Rabbits – Overjoyed
body:
LA’s trio** Russians With Rabbits** (great name, huh) have that awesome, scuzzy, Coma Cinema vibe to their music that I just love.

On this, what appears to be their debut track, they tear through thirty years of influences, ranging from the likes of Joy Division to Weezer to Guided By Voices, bypassing a whole host of modern, pop-punk artists. Check out _Overjoyed_ below.
